title: Remove Vayne's flat true damage on her W and revert her long time mana buffs
body:
There, she's fine.

These two small changes are literally the only changes she needs.

replies.body: Remove flat damage on her Silver Bolts, and reduce her aspd per level. 4% per level is a massive amount, especially considering Vayne typically rushes bork and pd/shiv which grants even more aspd. She has too much access to Silver Bolts proc.

Actually this needs to happen. Also should be less just instant knockback/stun if there is a wall anywhere near. What I mean is when you barely hit a wall you shouldn't really be stunned (actually you should be rooted in the first place) but maybe (not that I want to help Vayne) closer walls root for longer as the bolt embeds itself deeper. This would make sense, and help balance it a bit. Right now it's if you get close to Vayne she just e's you far away but not quite far enough to not be able to chase until she gets her 3 attacks in. Yeah silver bolts make her op, but it's also her ability to just stay right on the edge of engaging, allowing her to both poke and disengage if she wants, which is fair, but just way too easy to do, kinda like cait just standing there with dumb long autoattacks.

What about reworking W into an ammo systen?

W was supposed to be a tankbusting damage tool, yet it's just sitting there as "lol EVEN more damage at 3 AA hmk.".

It's silver bolts, she should be specifically use them when she needs, instead she has an infinite amount of them to use as she wants.

Make her W a toggle that consumes silver bolts she stores over time, so she acutally has to think on who use them, because let's be honest, Vayne using ult has already MUCH more damage than 90% of ADC, silverbolts are just a plus that happen to be true damage on %.

Eh. Not a fan. Having to hit someone 3 times is enough of a gate for the ability, and her ultimate already serves to give her a limited duration steroid. Tuning it down a bit would probably be much nicer. If we really had to go down that path, making it activate after 4 hits and increasing the damage proportionally would be much better.

Except Vayne isn't broken.

The only actual broken champions that exist in League by definition are {{champion:78}} {{champion:2}} {{champion:83}} {{champion:6}} {{champion:23}} {{champion:44}}

If olaf is broken, then so is vayne.  I fail to see how having no effective defensive options is any different than not being able to cc olaf.  The difference is that olaf's immunity turns off after a few seconds, whereas vayne's true damage does not.  

I think broken works fine for a champ that spams %maxHP true damage, has a 2 second cd combat stealth/reposition and a point and click knockback/stun.  This champion has so many good things on her kit, and is, by virtue of having that stupid true damage, way too good at dealing with tanks, who are are basically %%%%ed as soon as vayne is locked in if they don't have a point and click cc and a team with good followup.  If the % damage wasn't enough, she's got flat true damage too just in case she can't kill you in the duration of her stun for some reason.  If she wants to shred tanks, that's fine, but she shouldn't just win a fight with anyone who can't reliably cc her.  You can't nerf the stealth in any meaningful way without mechanical changes.  The dash can't get much shorter, and increasing its cd would likely make her unplayable in teamfights.  Per passive also makes her impossible to run from, but she also gets access to more disengage than any carry should have.

So yeah, she's %%%%ing broken.  She is a champ who will never both be, and appear balanced.  She will always hard counter tanks unless she loses enough true damage to be legitimately terrible.  She will always hard counter skill shots because of her tumble being on a laughably low cd.  She will always destroy squishies in her current state because of the duration of her cc and all the free stats she gets when she ults, in addition to the flat true damage.  If it weren't for her lack of wave clear or her low range, this champion would be damn close to perfect.

On top of that, her numbers are %%%%ing stupid.  Aside from draven and morde, she's got the highest AD scaling of any ADC, and she has one of the higher base attack speeds in addition to the highest attack speed scale in the game, for the highest attack speed at 18.

Boy, any champion is broken and overpowered when you inflate their kit to ridiculous degrees. 

Vayne isn't broken, she has many aspects to be changed and tweaked that allow her to function in a healthy state, while the champions I mentioned are left intentionally in a nerfed state because their kits are unable to be balanced in any way. 

Broken is being used haphazardly now for any champions someone dislikes instead of the actual meaning Riot is using.

She really hasn't received any meaningful changes the last few years, minor buff here and their but nothing significant, but was regarded as being fine before hand.

What's changed is the champions that were keeping her in this state got nerfed and Meddler has acknowledged that already. As well as items like the {{item:3153}} getting buffed for her, and a meta that was favoring a tank busting ADC.

One more suggestion:
remove her E initial damage (or move it to the stun part) and\or remove silver bolts proc if she doesn't stun her target against a wall. This weakens her Q-AA-AA-E combo which makes her obnoxious to trade in early levels. In particular it will be a relative buff to other champions who use multiple attacks to do things, like Ashe or Varus, who are both healthy.

Her W is completely fine, the main problem she has currently is her ultimate's CD being way too low.

The flat damage on her W increases her effective %HP damage by 37% against squishy targets.

It's supposed to be a tank killing tool. It can still be effective against squishies, but that flat damage is defeating the purpose.

You know what? GP got a barrel mini game. Skarner got his crystal mini game. Now Vayne will get her own mini game!

W: Silver Bolts
Every third attack on the same target deals x true damage and x% of the target's max hp as true damage. Every Silver Bolts proc consumes 1 silver bolt. 
When the game begins, silver mines will spawn randomly around the map. Vayne and her team can capture these silver mines permanently by standing near them for x seconds. In order to gain access to the Silver Bolts proc, Vayne must control at least one of these mines. Over time, as the silver is mined and weaponized, Vayne will passively stack silver bolts.
